title: [Cancer] Fecal transplants show promise in improving melanoma treatment: In a world-first clinical trial scientists have found fecal microbiota transplants (FMT) from healthy donors are safe and show promise in improving response to immunotherapy in patients with advanced melanoma

[Neuroscience] Schizophrenia is associated with somatic mutations while the fetus is developing in the womb. This study is one of the first to rigorously describe the relationship between somatic (not inherited) genetic mutations and schizophrenia risk.
